title: "AI Black Hole"
content:
# AI Black Hole

Welcome to AI Black Hole, a website dedicated to exploring the cutting edge of artificial intelligence and its applications in space exploration. Our team of AInauts and their AI companions conduct experiments on the edge of a black hole, pushing the boundaries of what we know about time and space.

Through our articles, videos, and interactive features, we aim to educate and inspire people about the potential of AI and space exploration. Join us on this exciting journey as we delve deeper into the mysteries of the universe and harness the power of AI to unlock its secrets.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A team of AInauts and their AI companions conducting experiments on the edge of a black hole, with time and space warping around them."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
